title: AMG website has been deployed.
desc: The new website for Aurum Management Group, which has been in development since last week, has officially been deployed to Netlify. This is a major step towards the website being completed and available to the public.
author: John Smith

title: New Album Release by Star Artist
desc: AMG's star artist, DJ Moonlight, has released a new album that is already topping charts worldwide. The album features collaborations with several high-profile artists.
author: Alice Johnson

title: AMG Annual Music Festival Announced
desc: AMG has announced the dates and lineup for its annual music festival. The event will feature performances from top artists and promises to be an unforgettable experience.
author: Bob Lee

title: Exclusive Interview with Rising Star
desc: We sat down with rising star Lily Starling to talk about her journey, inspirations, and what's next for her career. Read the full interview here.
author: Susan Parker

title: Aerotype Productions signed to major deal.
desc: Aerotype Productions has signed a major deal with Aurum Management Group. Rumor is spreading that they are also making a major motion picture about his life.
author: Jane Doe
